Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/37th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/37th, due to police activity near State/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/37th, due to police activity near State/37th.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 39th, Indiana, 35th, State and over regular route.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 35th, Michigan, 39th, State and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Bosworth
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Ashland, Division and Elston due to street blockage, near North Avenue/Bosworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Ashland, Division, Elston and over regular route, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Bosworth.

Allow extra travel time.
